comment.body:
Not only would you be wasting the other person's time by having them do the checking out of many profiles, if done right you could essentially trap them - and algorithms - in a web of misinformation which could potentially result in you actually dissapearing among the forest of manufactured profiles.
But the problem piece would be the "if done right", because if you're looking to dissapear but you already have even the slightest internet activity connected to you, well, that'd be the biggest weak-spot among all the defenses/obfuscation/misinformation... it'd be like a bankrobber walking into a bank, and then standing in front of the security camera while putting on his mask.
